org.apache.ambari.server.orm.dao

Class ExtensionLinkDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.orm.dao.ExtensionLinkDAO

  • public class ExtensionLinkDAO
extends Object
    The ExtensionLinkDAO class is used to manage the persistence and retrieval of ExtensionLinkEntity instances. An extension version is like a stack version but it contains custom services. Linking an extension version to the current stack version allows the cluster to install the custom services contained in the extension version.

      • findById

        public ExtensionLinkEntity findById(long linkId)
        Gets an extension link with the specified ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the extension or null if none exists.

      • findAll

        public List<ExtensionLinkEntity> findAll()
        Gets all of the defined extension links.
        Returns:
        all of the extension links loaded from resources or an empty list (never null).

      • refresh

      • merge

        public ExtensionLinkEntity merge(ExtensionLinkEntity link)
        Merge the specified extension link with the existing extension link in the database.
        Parameters:
        link - the extension link to merge (not null).
        Returns:
        the updated extension link with merged content (never null).

      • createOrUpdate

        public void createOrUpdate(ExtensionLinkEntity link)
                    throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Creates or updates the specified entity. This method will check ExtensionLinkEntity.getLinkId() in order to determine whether the entity should be created or merged.
        Parameters:
        link - the link to create or update (not null).
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
